TopicTitle: Something Something the user around me

Articles.Content:
I've seen a lot of "The user above me" Or "The user below me" games, so i've created a frankenstein of then!

The way you play is:

User 1: The user below me has a large signature, and a lot of rep points

User 2: Yes on the sig, no on the rep, The user below me has a funny PFP, and the user above me has a 10/10 avatar

so on and so forth, create as many combos or new The user above/below me categories!

Go nuts!

The user below me has a crazy space man six year old how is plotting to lock his parents outside and take control of a certain neighbour/ schoolmates house (you know who I’m talking about) and also has over 1000 rep and also has a doggo.
